ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Jeff..will keep this in mind...Have hunted mammoths with the BF but never seen the tusks...guess i am gonna have to check out his backpacks...LOL
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Jeff..will keep this in mind...Have hunted
mammoths with the BF but never seen the tusks...guess
i am gonna have to check out his backpacks...LOL

**hugs**
Amaiya, Druid, Fennin Ro, Loyal to Tunare

--- Jeff Gaudry <bgrifter@...> wrote:
> >I need to find a better Melee weapon for my young,
> >on her own Druid, Amaiya (Ayonae Ro). BF had
> >suggested asking around for a Fine Steel Scimitar
> but
> >I have so little money right now and the guy I
> talked
> >to last night wanted 10pp for the one he
>
> It's a little out of your budget, but something to
> keep in mind for the future. At least on the Karana
> server, the price of a Springwood Club has
> plumetted.
> I frequently see them offered in EC now for 400pp,
> which may sound like a lot right now, but by the
> time
> you reach your 20's is no problem at all. (hunting
> mammoths in Everfrost pays off real quick, they drop
> tusks like snakes drop fangs, and tusks sell for 8pp
> each) Gives you something to work towards. :)
>
>
>
______________________________________________________________________
>
> File your taxes online! http://taxes.yahoo.ca
>
